Articles.Content:
I was looking for stuff to decorate two bare walls of my room, and my thoughts quickly drifted to the KSP store, looking for posters. I was surprised to find that squad sold none, not on their store, nor on their CafePress and Maker Shop pages.

Perhaps that could/might be changed in the future, it seems like something people would buy if they were available. There are a bunch of user submitted ones on RedBubble, but none that were terribly appealing. Some official posters might be a welcome addition to the line of KSP merchandise.

Thoughts?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125495-Helpful-Lady-5-explained-with-ten-hundred-most-commonly-used-words

I wish someone would make poster of this. I have seen the "up-goer five" one on XKCD store and was planning to buy it eventually, but shipping cost are huge for Belgium so I wil wait a bit. anyway if anybody would have the guts to make this helpfull lady in poster size, I would buy it in a second
Sounds like a suggestion. And so, this thread has been moved to Suggestions.
